# Setup

```{r packages}
sapply(list("sf", "tidyverse", "raster", "terra", "here" , "d6geodata"), 
       library, character.only = TRUE, logical.return = TRUE)
```

# create folder

```{r path}
data_name <- d6geodata::data_name()

path <- here("data-proc", data_name)

dir.create(path = path)
```

# Data

```{r data}
(germany_3035_sf <- st_read(here("data-raw", 
                                 "germany",
                                 "administrative_units_germany_2020_28532_bkg_shp",
                                 "vg2500_01-01.utm32s.shape", 
                                 "vg2500",
                                 "vg2500_lan.shp")) %>% 
   dplyr::select(GEN) %>% 
   st_transform(3035)
 )

```

# processing

```{r processing}

```

# create meta data file

```{r metadata}
d6geodata::build_meta_file(path = path)
```

# create html file

```{r report}
d6geodata::create_report(path_name = data_name, out_path = path)
```
